title: 21st Annual Key West Songwriter's Festival - May 5
seo_title: 21st Annual Key West Songwriter's Festival - May 5
seo_description:
The Key West Songwriter's Festival is the largest festival of its kind in the world! Join us and enjoy an intimate free concert poolside at The Marker's Serenity pool located in the tropical gardens. 
5:30pm : Dean Alexander
6:30pm: Bob DiPiero
short_description: 21st Annual Key West Songwriter's Festival May 5, 2016
contents:
The Key West Songwriter's Festival is the largest festival of its kind in the world! Join us and enjoy an intimate free concert poolside at The Marker's Serenity pool located in the tropical gardens.
